title: The respective ratio between the present ages of Ram and Rakesh is 6 : 11. Four years ago the ratio of their ages was 1 : 2 respectively. What will be Rakesh's age after five years? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let Ram's age be 6x. Then Rakesh's age = 11x Four years ago the ratio of their ages was 1:2. So (6x-4)/(11x-4) = 1/2 =>2(6x-4) =11x - 4 => 12x-8 = 11x-4 =>12x-11x=-4+8 = x = 4 Rakesh's age = 11×4 = 44 After five years his age will be 44+5 =49
